passage_text: Warming temps, falling prices On March 18, the average price of regular unleaded in Mankato was $2.47 per gallon, more than a dime higher than Rochester and St. Cloud and 13 cents higher than the Twin Cities average.
Mankato has been a gas-price oasis since the opening of Fleet Farm By Mark Fischenich mfischenich@mankatofreepress.com Mankato Free Press.

On July 11, for instance, the average Mankato price was just under $2.46 per gallon, with the lowest-priced stations at $2.42, compared to $2.55 in Rochester, $2.68 in St. Cloud and $2.67 in the Twin Cities.

$2.62update. There are 14 Regular gas price reports in the past 5 days in Mankato, MN. The average Regular gas price in Mankato, MN is $2.39, which is $0.37 lower than U.S. national average Regular gas price $2.76. The lowest Regular gas price is $2.24 of SuperAmerica (#4255) located at 201 Webster Ave, Mankato, MN 56003. The highest Regular gas price is $2.62 of Marathon-Happy Dans located at 2160 Hoffman Rd, Mankato, MN 56001.
Gas prices. Gas prices in Mankato have been unusually low compared to other cities since the April arrival of Mills Fleet Farm, prompting an investigation by the Minnesota Department of Commerce.
